refnamediv.refpurpose: Menu: Generates a C Code simulation function for the selected super block.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This menu allows to generate the C code of the simulation function associated with a Super Block.
The code generation is obtained simply by selecting a Super block and then the Code Generation menu.
If the Super Block satisfies the required conditions, a dialog box pops up to ask for a block name, a directory where to put the generated files and for optional libraries requested by the linker.

Given this information the code is generated, compiled and linked with Scilab. The Super Block is automatically replaced by a new block which implements the generated code. It is then possible to run the modified diagram. The code for standalone use is also generated.

refsection.title: Important remarks
refsection.para: If the super block contains continuous time states, generated C code calls a fixed step ODE solver to integrate the ODE part of the diagram. Consequently the behavior of the generated simulation function may not be exactly similar to the original super block.

If the super block has several activation input ports the behavior of the generated simulation function may not be exactly similar to the original super block due to different handling of asynchronous activations.
